title: Sophisticated Turkiye Buyukada Island Escape with Onsite Spa & Rooftop Terrace
description:
Set on Turkiye's dreamy island of Buyukada in the Mamara Sea, this opulent hideaway exudes timeless Ottoman appeal and features the ultimate in modern indulgence. Plush suites offer sea views with Istanbul's sprawling metropolis in the background, while the gold-glazed indoor pool at the spa provides the ideal setting for an authentic hammam ritual.

Just a short boat ride from Istanbul, you can soak up legendary sights like the Hagia Sophia Grand Mosque and the majestic Topkapi Palace, before returning to the relaxed pace of the Princes' Islands, renowned for their well-preserved traditional architecture, charming horse-drawn carriages and jaw-dropping sunsets.
